text: The Maratha Koli is a Koli caste in Maharashtra who fought for Maratha Confederacy during the Maratha ruler Shivaji and for their bravery, Shivaji recognised them as Maratha. according to the District Gazetteer of Thane from 1882, The elite or respectable Koli families were called as Maratha Koli in Maharashtra. == References == == Other websites == *Report on the Fresh Water Fish and Fisheries of India and Burma By Francis Day, 1873 Category:Maratha Confederacy
title: Maratha Koli
